data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 3, Carlos Carvalho for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Lazar Rosic (Moreirense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 9, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Moreirense throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
In Moreira de Conegos Santa Clara attack through Shahriar. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 11, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Moreirense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santa Clara.
Filipe Soares (Moreirense) has received a yellow card from Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 12, Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Moreira de Conegos.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Moreirense.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 15, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Santa Clara's area.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Santa Clara.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Santa Clara.
Moreirense attack but Derik Lacerda's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 22, Santa Clara's Pierre Sagna breaks free at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Santa Clara's Osama Rashid gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Osama Rashid for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Moreirense.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Free kick Moreirense.
In the minute 33, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 34, Santa Clara's Shahriar has been booked in Moreira de Conegos.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Moreirense throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Moreirense.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Derik Lacerda is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Moreirense's Derik Lacerda looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The match at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas has been interrupted briefly for a check on Derik Lacerda, who is down injured.
In the minute 42, Felipe Pires (Moreirense) has replaced the possibly injured Derik Lacerda at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Can Moreirense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Moreirense push forward at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas and Yan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santa Clara defence.
Felipe Pires of Moreirense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Santa Clara drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Moreirense drives forward and Anthony D`Alberto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 48, Santa Clara advance rapidly upfield but Iancu Ioan Vasilica blows for offside.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 51, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos Moreirense attack through Walterson. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 56, Anderson Carvalho (Santa Clara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Moreirense.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara just outside Moreirense's area.
Santa Clara's Osama Rashid gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
Santa Clara are coming forward and Carlos Carvalho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Goncalo Franco is replacing Alex Soares for the home team.
Moreirense's Felipe Pires breaks free at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Free kick Moreirense.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Moreirense's half.
In the minute 69, Moreirense's Walterson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Costinha of Santa Clara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 72, Yan puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 75, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
The away team replace Anderson Carvalho with Cryzan.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's second substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Salomao replacing Carlos Carvalho.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Santa Clara.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 78, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense.
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas, Mikel Villanueva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Santa Clara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Lincoln is on a sub for Pierre Sagna for Santa Clara.
In the minute 84, Santa Clara make their fourth substitution with Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis replacing Osama Rashid.
Moreirense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Fabio Cardoso for Santa Clara has been booked by Iancu Ioan Vasilica and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santa Clara's Costinha has been booked in Moreira de Conegos.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Moreirense's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
Moreirense’s Walterson is on his feet again at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Moreira de Conegos. The final score is 1-0.
The home team replace Yan with Galego.
Ibrahima Camara is on a sub for Filipe Soares for Moreirense.
Nene is replacing Costinha for Santa Clara at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Walterson for Moreirense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
